oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Circular No. 5 from the headquarters of the Grand Army of the Republic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Circular No. 5 from the Grand Army of the Republic (GAR), Adjutant General's Office, Toledo, Ohio. This circular was included in an envelope addressed to James George of Fentress County, Tenn. The circular pertains to ammendments to the GAR's national Rules and Regulations proposed by various state posts.
